<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Deathly Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=3487) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 34</row>

**Archetype** [Reanimator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=175)

**Prerequisites**
[Reanimator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3486)

</column>

---

No means of creating or ruling the undead is beyond your grasp, even those of magical traditions not your own. You learn either the [_eyes of the dead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1104) or [_subjugate undead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1106) focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by meditating over the earthly remains of a dead sentient creature. The rules for focus spells appear [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=276). Focus spells granted by the reanimator archetype are from the same tradition as those used to meet the archetype's prerequisite.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time, you learn a different spell and your focus pool increases by 1 Focus Point.

<title level="2">Deathly Secrets leads to...</title>
[Greater Deathly Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=3490), [Master of the Dead](/Feats.aspx?ID=3491)
name: Deathly Secrets
